reviewText:
My family and I have always enjoyed the "Footprints of God" series and this edition, although quite different, was no exception.  I guess it was coincident with the fact we had recently started a study of historical maps of the area and it was pleasant to be able to see a bird's eye view of the area and its points of interest.

I know some reviewers have criticized the shortness of the video and others are concerned with the lack of dialogue.  I found that, for what it is, it was not tedious and the points of interest well noted on-screen.
